overview: In this upside down, topsy-turvy world, the women wear the pants and the men, well let's just say they fulfill a certain need. Michael Raven weaves a hilarious story of role reversal in his best comedy to date. Poker parties, anal, cheating wives, you name it, it's all what happens when women are on top!
tagline: In this worl the women wear the pantsâ€¦but not for very long.
title: Women on Top
